name: Blue steel gauntlets
data: It increases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence superbly.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users magical resistance strongly.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'nerve mastery'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
